trigger_prototype.name: Redeliver rate in {#AGGQUEUENAME} is not null last 30 minutes

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{#GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.queue.messages[{#AGGQUEUENAME}]",last,0].min(#10)}>0 and {Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{#GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.queue.messages_stats.deliver[{#AGGQUEUENAME}]",last,0].max(#10)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: Zero rate of delivery in {#AGGQUEUENAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App RabbitMQ Service:rabbitmq.cpu.last()}/{Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{$GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.cpu",last,0].last()}>((100+{$BALANCE_OFFSET})/100) or {Template App RabbitMQ Service:rabbitmq.cpu.last()}/{Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{$GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.cpu",last,0].last()}<({$BALANCE_OFFSET}/100)
trigger.name: RabbitMQ cpu usage is unbalanced

trigger.expression: {Template App RabbitMQ Service:rabbitmq.disk.last()}/{Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{$GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.disk",last,0].last()}>((100+{$BALANCE_OFFSET})/100) or {Template App RabbitMQ Service:rabbitmq.disk.last()}/{Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{$GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.disk",last,0].last()}<({$BALANCE_OFFSET}/100)
trigger.name: RabbitMQ disk usage is unbalanced

trigger.expression: {Template App RabbitMQ Service:rabbitmq.memory.last()}/{Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{$GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.memory",last,0].last()}>((100+{$BALANCE_OFFSET})/100) or {Template App RabbitMQ Service:rabbitmq.memory.last()}/{Template App RabbitMQ Service:grpavg["{$GROUPNAME}", "rabbitmq.memory",last,0].last()}<({$BALANCE_OFFSET}/100)
trigger.name: RabbitMQ memory usage is unbalanced
